title: Your favorite champion just got in a fight with Batman. Who wins?

replies.body:
{{champion:45}} I'm not sure. Veigar is EVIL! He's the final boss of League of Legends! A level 99 Dark Mage! He can make the skies split open and rain dark matter on his enemies! He can distord space and trap his foes in an event horizon! He can unleash the freaking **BIG BANG** on his foes!

But then again, he's up against the goddamn Batman. Veigar would probably die to Batman's auto-attack before he can even notice the Dark Knight.
Against batman? Ha. That would be a short fight
{{champion:45}} IS THAT A SHORT JOKE?!?!?

>Veigar would probably ~~die~~ get incapacitated to Batman's auto-attack before he can even notice the Dark Knight.

Fixed that for you. The Batman does not kill.

"Hey Batman, I think you've gone overboard with Veigar there. You managed to repaint Summoner's rift in a single punch, and we've found Veigar's hat in our fountain. His left hand has been found near the blue buff monster, and I think Dragon ate his feet."

"I'm Batman and Batman dosen't kill! Now shut up before I not-kill you too!"

How do you explain this though VVV
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ULSvR6hhyI
That wasn't the real Batman. That was some cheap knockoff.
{{champion:67}} vs. Batman... Have you ever struggled with yourself? I think Vayne's womanly wiles would give her the edge.
Wayne > Vayne.
V does come first in the alphabet though
Because W is patient. W takes it's time and does it right.
W is twice that of V. vv = w

> [{quoted}](name=DeynaTaggerung,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MyxqcvvJ,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-07-16T15:56:21.057+0000)
>
> {{champion:67}} vs. Batman... Have you ever struggled with yourself? I think Vayne's womanly wiles would give her the edge.

I don't think Vayne would use her womanly wiles. She's too serious.
You're right, and batman's probably too serious to care even if she did. So a tie?

> [{quoted}](name=DeynaTaggerung,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MyxqcvvJ,comment-id=000b00010000,timestamp=2015-07-16T16:20:48.115+0000)
>
> You're right, and batman's probably too serious to care even if she did. So a tie?

It ends in a tie and Vayne and Wayne form an alliance. Maybe.
So...Catwoman Vayne? :O

Batman has permastealth, high mobility, ridiculous CC, and can see enemies who are hiding in bushes/in the fog of war. Rito tried to nerf him, but he nerfed rito instead. Why do you think the lore stopped coming?

Gross, there's a Riven main here. 

On Topic: {{champion:35}} 's Box's can't fear batman cause he's not afraid of anything. He'll just man handle my clown =(
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v429/AstroFilm/rab2vq.gif
So do we agree Shaco has the most chances out of every champion? I mean, given Batman's history with clowns...
Very true. Clowns are the natural predator of bats.
But who's the natural predator of clowns then?

Bats.
http://pre06.deviantart.net/8962/th/pre/i/2011/187/d/8/batman_vs_joker_by_nick_percival-d3l6x8x.jpg
That's an odd food chain.
Yes. That is why there are so many casualties.

But Batman has lost vs Deathstroke in the past not necessarily because of just fighting skill, but because Deathstroke is just as smart as Batman in terms of battlefield strategy and planning which is how Batman beats everyone else

So, Swain would stand a good chance vs him as well, especially since in addition to his magic, Swain is no pushover when it comes to fighting. He was a regular soldier at one point so a veteran foot soldier turned general's gotta know what he's doing
I feel like Batman's CC counters {{champion:92}} so he would win
What is broken by Batman cannot be reforged.

{{champion:17}} 

Satan always wins.
Batman detects all weakness

A well-fabricated lie by the master himself.

You have been fooled, caped crusader.

Meanwhile, Satan doesn't have to dig far.

{{champion:37}} Not a chance
{{champion:45}} Nope...
{{champion:122}} CHAOS DU...nah, he'd have problems too.
{{champion:74}} Batman's tech is better
{{champion:17}} Batman's antitoxins...enough said
{{champion:21}} He's fought pirates in the past...she's no issue
{{champion:120}} Even RUA version is no match
{{champion:30}} Batman laughs in the face of death
{{champion:79}} This would give new meaning to punch drunk
{{champion:86}}  DEMACIA >Batman
Batman witnessed the strength of Demacia, and was not impressed.
Zilean would win bring his parents back to life and make him fight them

(Not necessarily my absolute favorite, but probably the only guy smarter than batman in terms of battlefield strategy and planning)
{{champion:50}} Your methods and tactics are impressive, but inferior! They will not save you!

I can imagine it being like Deathstroke vs Batman
Swain smarter than Batman? Please. Compared to Batman Swain is like Kim Kardashian. Batman is smarter than all the champions combined.
Swain's like Batman, he plans way way way ahead to make sure he knows he can take whatever he's up against which is exactly how Batman can take on those OP metahumans

So is Deathstroke, but that didn't help him.
http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/709652023003010661/25EBC23EBB5BFF50F4924DCF88072C8ED0649ABB/

Ra's as well
http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/scale_super/10/105634/3662820-cut+sword.gif

Because in those scenarios, those guys didn't know sht about the Batman other than "oh hey, he knows how to fight and he wears a batsuit". So then they got rekt cuz Batman was smart enough to exploit that

If Swain doesn't know sht about Batman, then he's toast, but who doesn't know sht about the Batman at this point? Methinks even if Swain loses he'll give Batman the hardest time
Ra's didn't know about Batman? He trained him....
In fighting? Yes, but little did he know Batman was a tactical genius!
Swain underestimated J4's mind, even though Jarven is out in the open. Why would Swain *not* underestimate Batman?
Welp,

Deathstroke has actually defeated Batman in the past, same goes for Bane(who "broke the bat") which most people forget is also a genius. 

No really here's a scan of them fighting in the comics.

Oh sure, there have been several people who have beaten Batman when he wasn't ready. Superman has beaten him on several occasions. But the Bat always returns. Batman's power comes not from being invincible, but from being indomitable.

Lex Luthor is actually the smartest human being in DC comics, and he has outwitted and played Batman in the past. Batman's IQ is 192, which makes him a genius. However while he is a brilliant detective, and knows a thing or two about psychology and so forth he is surpassed in intelligence by other heroes including Superman(Kryptonians are OP), The Flash(He can process information as quickly as he can run), Mister Terrific, Tony Stark, Mr.Fantastic, Hank Pym, Atom/Ray Palmer, etc.. It honestly stands to reason {{champion:74}} is more intelligent than the Batman.

Raw intelligence is not enough. It is how you use it. Just like the body must be trained, so too must the mind. Batman can get into people's head. He figures out how they think, and how to stop it. When Batman cannot rise to your level, he drags you down to his.

He would still be defeated by a blind man {{champion:64}}(his E even removes Batman's stealth advantage) :P. Who everyone knows is equal to Spiderman and Daredevil combined!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e8K1m6SCRz4
